    if len(resp.Lexicons) == 0 {
        fmt.Println("Did not retrieve any lexicons")
        return
    }

    for _, l := range resp.Lexicons {
        fmt.Println(*l.Name)
        fmt.Println("  Alphabet: " + *l.Attributes.Alphabet)
        fmt.Println("  Language: " + *l.Attributes.LanguageCode)
        fmt.Println("")
    }
